hooks.command: title="Claude Code"; msg="$CLAUDE_NOTIFICATION"; if command -v notify-send &>/dev/null; then notify-send "$title" "$msg"; elif command -v osascript &>/dev/null; then osascript -e "display notification \"$msg\" with title \"$title\""; elif command -v termux-notification &>/dev/null; then termux-notification --title "$title" --content "$msg"; fi; exit 0
